content: this is a very pretty baby blanket and much easier to knit than you might imagine - with just a 4 row repeat pattern requires ~ dk yarn around 100g for smallest size around 200g for 24 size and around 350g for 30 size 4mm needles three sizes ~ premature baby newborn baby baby matching baby cardigan hat & bonnet also available so sweet **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
